title: Swimming Lessons:  how our health care system fails us; a mother's personal reflections and cry for help
description: Part memoir, part how-to for parents, teachers, policymakers and mental health care professionals, this is the story of one family coping with mental illness in two of their four children. (This book will leave you feeling "encouraged and relieved, angry and hopeful." Gordon Dean, National Alliance on Mental Illness )
author: Mary McKay
